"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Meri says that after Aelio's vanguard arrived, the area became a lot more lively. She'd never seen so many people before, so she was a little nervous, but when she talked to them, she learned that they were all kind and good people. From them, the siblings learned what it meant to work together."
